name: inject-stylesheet
description: Create a style element with CSS properties, filtering input using a allowlist or blocklist

1.0.0.name: inject-stylesheet
1.0.0.description: Create a <style> element with CSS properties, filtering input using a whitelist or blacklist

scripts.test: npm run lint && karma start config/karma.js --single-run
